Content:
Enable AP settings for this group.
(Default: Disabled)

The maximum amount of action points.
(Default: 6)

The amount of action points gained when a character's turn starts.
(Default: 4)

The starting amount of action points when combat begins.
(Default: 4)

If enabled, two-handed weapons can backstab.
(Default: Disabled)

Enable backstab settings for this group.
(Default: Disabled)

If enabled, only melee weapons or skills can backstab. Melee skills will use the Skill Minimum Distance setting.
(Default: Enabled)

If skill backstabbing is enabled, this is the maximum distance allowed between the attacker and target (meaning they must be within this distance).
(Default: 2.5m)

If enabled, skills will be able to backstab depending on settings (melee only, minimum distance).
(Default: Disabled)

If enabled, characters require the Backstab talent to be able to backstab with non-dagger equipment or skills.
(Default: Enabled)
Override skill tiers to make them show up in character creation.
